testcase.name: Verify user able to place order in Open Cart application
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Open Cart home page........................................passed When user navigate to Open Cart login page from MyAccount flyout............passed And user login with username "app.username" and password "app.password".....passed Then Open Cart account page should open.....................................passed And user navigate to Open Cart home page from account page..................passed And user search for product "item.search"...................................passed When user clicks Add to cart button.........................................passed Then Open Cart product detail page should open..............................passed And user add product to shopping cart.......................................passed When user navigate to Open Cart shopping cart page from product view drop...passed Then Open Cart shopping cart page should open...............................passed And user verify the product details in shopping cart........................passed
